dirs.description: Directories that contain the categories you want to build into the manifest.

includeBlocks.description: The names of the blocks that should be included in the manifest.

includeCategories.description: The names of the categories that should be included in the manifest.

doNotListBlocks.description: The names of blocks that shouldn't be listed when the user runs add.

doNotListCategories.description: The names of categories that shouldn't be listed when the user runs add.

excludeDeps.description: Remote dependencies that should not be added to the manifest.

preview.description: Display a preview of the blocks list.

rules.description: Configure rules when checking manifest after build.

no-category-index-file-dependency.description: Disallow depending on the index file of a category.

no-unpinned-dependency.description: Require all dependencies to have a pinned version.

require-local-dependency-exists.description: Require all local dependencies to exist.

max-local-dependencies.description: Enforces a limit on the amount of local dependencies a block can have.

no-unused-block.description: Disallow unused blocks. (Not listed and not a dependency of another block)

no-framework-dependency.description: Disallow frameworks (Svelte, Vue, React, etc.) as dependencies.
